thread.title: Tragic George Michael had '500 lovers in 7 years'
thread.title_full: Tragic George Michael had '500 lovers in 7 years'

title: Tragic George Michael had '500 lovers in 7 years'
text:
REUTERS WHAM BAM: Star had prolific sex life, claims pal Piers Morgan 
The tragic star is said to have boasted about his prolific love life at a dinner party. 
TV presenter Piers also says George was being blackmailed by a French male prostitute. 
He said that the former Wham! singer was on “outrageously indiscreet form” at the star-studded bash a few years ago. 
GETTY ROMPS: Piers also claims George was being blackmailed by a French male prostitute 
NC LOVERS: George was with celebrity hairdresser Fadi from 2012 “George... chuckled: ‘I’ve decided just to admit everything so people can’t expose me for it.’” Piers Morgan 
Good Morning Britain host Piers said: “George, who had us all heaving with laughter with his searing, shocking honesty, chuckled: ‘I’ve decided just to admit everything so people can’t expose me for it.’” 
George’s romp admission came despite having two long-term boyfriends over more than 15 years. 
Sportswear exec Kenny Goss was with him from 1996 until 2009. 
NC BOYFRIENDS: Sportswear exec Kenny Goss was with him from 1996 until 2009 George Michael in pictures Pop icon George Michael in pictures 1 / 16 George Michael Performs At Palais Garnier in 2012 
And celebrity hairstylist Fadi Fawaz, 43, had been dating the Careless Whisper star since 2012. 
Kenny will reportedly play a big role in the singer’s funeral. 
George’s Greek family are said to have invited Kenny as a “show of acceptance” over the star’s homosexuality. 
But the send-off may be delayed until March as investigators are still trying to work out how George died aged 53 on Christmas Day. Related articles
